submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, hCuts: List[int], vCuts: List[int]) -> int:
        hCuts.sort(reverse=True)
        vCuts.sort(reverse=True)
        
        h_index = v_index = 0
        h_pieces = v_pieces = 1
        total_cost = 0
        
        while h_index < len(hCuts) and v_index < len(vCuts):
            if hCuts[h_index] >= vCuts[v_index]:
                total_cost += hCuts[h_index] * v_pieces
                h_pieces += 1
                h_index += 1
            else:
                total_cost += vCuts[v_index] * h_pieces
                v_pieces += 1
                v_index += 1
        
        while h_index < len(hCuts):
            total_cost += hCuts[h_index] * v_pieces
            h_pieces += 1
            h_index += 1
        
        while v_index < len(vCuts):
            total_cost += vCuts[v_index] * h_pieces
            v_pieces += 1
            v_index += 1
        
        return total_cost
